product_name: Icebreaker Tech Half-Zip Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: The Icebreaker Tech Half-Zip long underwear top is made of midweight merino wool to keep you warm; a long, ventilating front zip helps you cool down when you want. Merino wool wicks away moisture, breathes to regulate temperature and resists odors naturally. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Offset sleeves increase range of shoulder movement. Droptail hem offers increased coverage in back for active sports. Icebreaker Tech Half-Zip long underwear top has a slim fit. Machine washable; line dry or dry flat in shade.
short_description: The Icebreaker Tech Half-Zip long underwear top is made of midweight merino wool to keep you warm; a long, ventilating front zip helps you cool down when you want.
